captions.text: >>I KNOW HOW MUCH YOU HATE TRYING TO BARBECUE OUTSIDE.
WHAT WITH US LIVING IN THE FRIGID NORTH AND ALL.
LET'S JUST SEE WHAT WE HAVE HERE.
>>YOU KEEP SAYING HOW YOU WANT ME TO PAINT THE KITCHEN.
AND NOW YOU CAN DO IT.
THERE'S ALSO A GIFT CARD IN THERE SO YOU CAN BUY THE PAINT.

AND IF THERE'S ANY MONEY LEFT OVER AND YOU
WANT TO
GET US A NEW POWER SAW...
>>HONEY, YOU ALWAYS GET ME THE WORST GIFTS!
MY NAME LITERALLY MEANS BEST GIFT GIVER EVER!
I'VE BUILT MY LIFE ON THIS!
EVERY GIFT I'VE GOTTEN YOU IS GOLDEN!
I GET LETTERS ALL YEAR LONG FROM CHILDREN WHO TELL ME
WITH YOU THOUGH IT'S ALWAYS SUBTLE HINTING!
>>WAS I SUBTLY HINTING THAT I WANTED TO TAKE PART IN
YOUR STUPID LOVE LANGUAGE EXPERIMENT LAST YEAR!
>>I'VE ALREADY ADMITTED THAT THAT WAS A TERRIBLE IDEA!
"YOU ARE THE MOST BEAUTIFUL WOMAN IN THIS,"
>>SO, JUST TO BE CLEAR, YOUR LANGUAGE IS NOT
I GUESS I'M JUST THE WORST HUSBAND EVER!
DESPITE BEING IMMORTAL, OWNING A FLEET OF
FLYING REINDEER, AND FILLING EVERY CHILD IN THE
YOU'RE ALWAYS SO IRRITABLE CHRISTMAS MORNING.
>>I JUST ATE 12 BILLION COOKIES AND AM COMING OFF
THE CRAZIEST SUGAR HIGH YOU'VE EVER SEEN!
NOT TO MENTION THE ELVES ARE UNIONIZING,
MY LIFE IS SO HARD WORKING ONE DAY A YEAR!

YOU STILL CAN'T FIND A BETTER GIFT FOR YOUR
WIFE THAN A
I ALMOST FORGOT, I GOT YOU ANOTHER
I'M GOING TO GO SLEEP IN THE WORKSHOP.
>>HEY. ARE YOU LOOKING TO GET SOMEBODY A
BECAUSE I HAVE THE PERFECT IDEA.
THE PERSON IS, YOU MIGHT WANT TO GET THEM
AND IS FROM THE ANTHROPOLOGY FALL COLLECTION.
